Text: Did they add film grain to this movie? The picture looks grainier than Public.Enemies.720p.BluRay.x264-METiS.
I'm pretty sure Micheal Mann (director) added the grainy look for effect
This was mostly shot on digital cameras; I think the 'graininess' is more from the low light levels at which much of the film was shot. (Thanks for the movie!)

GRAIN? THAT IS WHAT WE CALLED CINEMATOGRAPHY.

THANK YOU AOLOFFLINE!!!
